567.title: Age limit of 18

tosdr.tldr: Flattr is available only to individuals who are at least 18 years old.
Flattr allows their advertisers to use cookies on the Flattr site. This allows these third parties to track you and collect information on your browsing habits.

meta.author: Hugo for “Terms of Service; Didn't Read”

678.title: Terms may be changed at any time, but you will be notified.

tosdr.case: user is notified on the day
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, but they will notify the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.
